title: Bloomberg Intelligence Radio: Amazon, BASF and Banks (Podcast)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Intelligence Radio: Amazon, BASF and Banks (Podcast)
description:
In this week's Bloomberg Intelligence Radio show, Paul Sweeney conducts interviews at Allen & Co. Analyst Seema Shah talks about Amazon Prime Day and the Internet site's product return agreement with Kohl's, while antitrust analyst Jennifer Rie examines Amazon's regulation and litigation threats. Jason Miner digs into BASF while Alison Williams talks about bank earnings and Deutsche Bank cutbacks. Hosts: Alix Steel and Paul Sweeney Producer: Rich Trueman

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
